title: How to Get a Pisces to Like You

steps.title: Don't act rude or obnoxious to their friends, or people they know.
steps.content: Don't act rude or obnoxious to their friends, or people they know. It's a real turn off for most.

steps.title: Don't put down values, things or people who are important to them.
steps.content: Don't put down values, things or people who are important to them.

steps.title: Don't be cruel to animals.
steps.content: Don't be cruel to animals. Don't even say that you would be cruel to animals.

steps.title: Pisces are emotional beings so they might do things on the basis of mere feelings.
steps.content: Pisces are emotional beings so they might do things on the basis of mere feelings. So if your Pisces does something which bothers you, like sending 10 emails in a week to show you that he or she cares, it's okay to speak to him or her about it. Just mind your words.

steps.title: Do little things to re-affirm that you care.
steps.content: Do little things to re-affirm that you care. Even if it's just an email every other day. Pisces doesn't need to be romanced in a big way. Small, tiny ways are often perfect. If you can do little thoughtful things for your Pisces, you'll score big time. But don't over-indulge your Pisces. Make them learn that just because you don't call every day, it doesn't mean you don't love them.

steps.title: Don't make promises to a Pisces that you cannot keep.
steps.content: Don't make promises to a Pisces that you cannot keep. Pisces are the type where if you break a promise they will never forget it and they will lose trust in you.

steps.title: It's okay to sit down with your Pisces to have a talk if he or she begins to be smothering.
steps.content: It's okay to sit down with your Pisces to have a talk if he or she begins to be smothering. Pisces just can't help it but they can change if you tell them. Again, be tactful with your words.

steps.title: Pisces are obliging to those they care about so please don't take advantage of your Pisces.
steps.content: Pisces are obliging to those they care about so please don't take advantage of your Pisces. Seek ways to reciprocate. They would appreciate you for it.

steps.title: Some Pisces like to be possessed in a relationship.
steps.content: Some Pisces like to be possessed in a relationship. That would make them feel more loved. But of course, don't go all fatal attraction on them and kill a bunny. For emphasis again, only SOME Pisces would love that.

steps.title: They love it when you give them homemade things, such as a love poem, rather than a new car.
steps.content: They love it when you give them homemade things, such as a love poem, rather than a new car. They are unworldly, and it will get you nowhere with them.

steps.title: Pisces are push overs and know it.
steps.content: Pisces are push overs and know it. When Pisces are being used or taken for granted they normally don't speak up immediately. They normally deal with it, but when it gets out of control they become very outspoken.

steps.title: Pisces are known to be the partner for life and love to love and be loved.
steps.content: Pisces are known to be the partner for life and love to love and be loved. If you want someone who is sensitive, compassionate, loving, interesting and a long term relationship then a Pisces is the one for you.

steps.title: Pisces are great with Cancers, Aries, Taurus, Scorpio, Virgos, Libras and other Pisces...
steps.content: Pisces are great with Cancers, Aries, Taurus, Scorpio, Virgos, Libras and other Pisces... [1] X Research source

steps.title: Pisces-Pisces relationships can be good or bad.
steps.content: Pisces-Pisces relationships can be good or bad. Depending on the type of Pisces the relationship with another Pisces can be bad because it could be like having a clone. Most of the time this isn't the case. Most of the time Pisces are great together.

steps.title: Pisces are amazing cooks and make perfect parents.
steps.content: Pisces are amazing cooks and make perfect parents.
